CROWDSEC_API_KEY.help: Key for the CrowdSec API given by cscli bouncer add.
CROWDSEC_API_KEY.label: CrowdSec API key

CROWDSEC_MODE.help: Mode of the CrowdSec API (live or stream).
CROWDSEC_MODE.label: CrowdSec Mode

CROWDSEC_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.help: Bouncer's request timeout in milliseconds (live mode).
CROWDSEC_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.label: CrowdSec live request timeout

CROWDSEC_STREAM_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.help: Bouncer's request timeout in milliseconds (stream mode).
CROWDSEC_STREAM_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.label: CrowdSec stream request timeout

CROWDSEC_UPDATE_FREQUENCY.help: Bouncer's update frequency in stream mode, in second.
CROWDSEC_UPDATE_FREQUENCY.label: CrowdSec request timeout
